subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[呍]], [[妘]], [[沄]], [[抎]], [[忶]], [[枟]], [[眃]], [[秐]], [[紜]]([[纭]]), [[耘]], [[耺]], [[夽]], [[芸]], [[凨]], [[囩]], [[雲]], [[藝]], [[魂]], [[䲰]]([[𪉂]])}}
* {{l|mul|[[転]], [[伝]]}} ''({{w|Shinjitai|Simplified}} from {{l|mul|專}} in Japanese)''
* {{l|mul|[[沄]], [[叆]], [[叇]], [[昙]]}} ''(Simplified from {{l|mul|雲}} in {{w|traditional Chinese}})''
* {{l|mul|[[会]], [[尝]], [[层]], [[动]], [[运]], [[坛]], [[酝]]}} ''(Simplified from various components in {{w|traditional Chinese}})'' <!-- The components are ⿱一𭥴,曾,⿱𫩠旨,重,亶,軍,𥁕 -->
